div.h2: HOPE Community Academy will be closed starting Monday, March 16th - March 27th. School will resume on May 4th, 2020 per Governor Walz's new executive order.
Kawm Txuj Kawm Ci Thiaj Yuav Muaj Nqi

div.h3: Student-Centered Learning. Safety & Respect. Inspire Curiosity. Resilience. Community Partners.

div.p: The mission of HOPE Community Academy is to educate all students to the highest levels of academic and social standards with a focus on Hmong language and culture.

p.br: Busing provided by JME and Ezy Ride

div.p: april, 2020

meta.content: No school for scholars and teaching staff. Enjoy the break! The school will be open during the break. School Hours: 7:30 AM - 3:00 PM

meta.content: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic and state Shelter at Home Orders, HOPE Community Academy’s committee and board meetings will be held by telephone or other electronic means until further notice.

We will be offering free breakfast and lunch meal pick up every Tuesday from 8:00 AM – 12:00 PM starting April 7th. Breakfast and lunch meals will consist of a week’s worth of food. Please come by the cafeteria to receive the meals.

p.strong: HOPE Community Academy Annual Board Meeting

br.br:
DATE: April 13, 2020
RE: 2020 Annual Meeting Notice

div.p: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic and state Shelter at Home Orders, HOPE Community Academy will be changing the format and delivery of our Board of Director’s Annual Meeting event on Wednesday, May 13, 2020. We plan to utilize electronic means (ie. Zoom) to conduct the Annual Meeting to connect with the community regarding school updates and changes to the Board of Directors. Please click here to read the letter from our Board Operations Committee which describes the event in more detail.

div.h3: HOPE Community Academy is authorized by St. Thomas University

div.p:
Contact: Dana Peterson
Assistant Director of Charter School Authorizing

1000 La Salle Avenue
Opus Hall 217
Minneapolis, MN 55403
